subject: Give each member of FT a color in scoreboard, on mini-map and command map
description: An interesting feature from CS:GO matchmaking. It consists of giving each player from your team a color (green, yellow, blue, etc.) on both mini-map, command map and scoreboard. It would be especially convenient for mixed matches and future matchmaking system, in which case you play with random people. That way you don't have to pronounce weird nicks and also you can see where exactly each player is at any given time.
